summary.span: The ManagementConfiguration attribute indicates that a property or field represents a read-write WMI property.

span.span: The ManagementConfiguration attribute indicates that a property or field represents a read-write WMI property.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: Gets or sets the mode of the property, which specifies whether changes to it are applied as soon as possible or when a commit method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Если определен метод фиксации, он отвечает за обновление всех свойств WMI чтения и записи, использующие режим.If there is a commit method defined, it is responsible for updating all read-write WMI properties that use the mode. Оно определяется .It is identified by the .
